solution_line_template: She gets a double espresso for ${double_espresso_price} every morning and an iced coffee for ${iced_coffee_price} in the afternoon so she spends {double_espresso_price}+{iced_coffee_price} = $<<{double_espresso_price}+{iced_coffee_price}={daily_coffee_spend}>>{daily_coffee_spend} every day on coffee
After {num_days} days, she spends {num_days}*{daily_coffee_spend} = $<<{num_days}*{daily_coffee_spend}={total_spent}>>{total_spent} on coffee
